gw.plugin.email.impl

Class JavaxEmailMessageTransport

  • java.lang.Object
    • gw.api.email.AbstractEmailMessageTransport
      • gw.plugin.email.impl.JavaxEmailMessageTransport
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject

    public class JavaxEmailMessageTransport
extends AbstractEmailMessageTransport
implements _proxy_.gw.lang.reflect.gs.IGosuObject
    This is a fully exposed javax mail implementation so that packages like JavaMail-Crypto can be used to sign documents. The maintaining of the key ring is left as an exercise for the user.
